content: With a rook-to-knight exchange on d4, when the game was even, Ding Liren (white) easily won the fourth game of the FIDE 2023 World Chess Championship, tying the match (Nepo 2, Ding 2).
translations: ita:Con lo scambio torre-cavallo su d4, quando la sfida era in parit√†, Ding Liren (bianco) ha vinto facilmente la quarta par
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
